author: CBC News
title: Oil price plunges to lowest level since 1999 as world drowns in oversupply
description: Oil prices plunged on Monday because storage facilities around the world are filling up with crude there's no demand for as the global economy is locked down by COVID-19.
content:
Oil prices plunged on Monday because storage facilities around the world are filling up with crude there's no demand for as the global economy is locked down by COVID-19.
The futures contract for West Texas Intermediate lost $6 US a barrel, going to $11.66 U… [+3242 chars]
